entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022
